title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4602.10 - Penalties for underage participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4602.10 - Penalties for underage participation

State Regulations

The commission shall penalize an authorized organization
found to have violated General Municipal Law sections 190-a(3) and 195-a, which
govern the minimum age for play, operation or the assisting in any raffle
conducted pursuant to General Municipal Law section 190-a, as follows: (a) for a first violation, a written warning
of such violation; (b) for a second
violation within one year of a violation, a fine of $500; (c) for a third violation within one year of
a violation, a fine of $1,000; and
(d) for a fourth or subsequent violation
within one year of a violation, such further actions as the commission may deem
appropriate, which may include without limitation the suspension or revocation
of any license or privilege to conduct raffles in this State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4602.10

Adopted

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
